attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we the undersigned hereby request that the prime minister calls an early election.
based on the rising cost of living in the uk, which could be eased by reducing fuel tax. also to allow a referendum on the eu treaty.
by calling an election the country would be given the opportunity to elect its desired goverment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
